Pobedio Zvezdu, pa dobio otkaz
Krka smenila Simona Petrova

05 Nov 2019

Košarkaški klub Krka sporazumno je raskinuo saradnju sa dosadašnjim trenerom Simonom Petrovom, objavio je zvanično klub iz Novog Mesta.
U slovenačkom klubu nisu bili zadovoljni rezultatima kluba, pa čak ni pobeda nad Crvenom zvezdom u trećem kolu ABA lige nije pomogla, te je stoga uručen otkaz Petrovu. Posle velikog trijumfa nad regionalnim šampionom Krka je vezala četiri poraza. U ponedeljak veče u Novom Mestu je trijumfovao Helios Domžale, što je iniciralo smenu.„Rezultati u poslednje vreme su nas naterali na ovu odluku. Klub i trener su se dogovorili da se saradnja završi. Želim da zahvalim Simonu za njegov posvećen rad i rezultate koje je ostvario sa timom. Sa njm na klupi vratili smo se u elitu iz ABA 2 lige. On će ostati legenda našeg kluba i želimo mu sve najbolje u daljem toku karijere“, rekao je predsednik kluba iz Malog Mesta Andraž Šuštaršič.
text:
He defeated the Star and was fired
Krka replaced Simon Petrov

05 Nov 2019

The Krka Basketball Club has mutually terminated its co-operation with former coach Simon Petrov, the club from Novo Mesto has officially announced.
The Slovenian club were not satisfied with the results of the club, and even the victory over Red Star in the third round of the ABA league did not help, and therefore was fired Petrov. After a great triumph over the regional champion, Krka tied four defeats. Helios Domzale triumphed in Novo Mesto on Monday night, initiating the shift. "The results have recently led us to make this decision. The club and coach agreed to end the collaboration. I want to thank Simon for his dedicated work and the results he has achieved with the team. With him on the bench, we are back in the elite of the ABA 2 league. He will remain a legend of our club and we wish him all the best in his further career, "said Andrija Sustarsic, president of the club from Mali.
